Reformed and fresh out of prison, Derek severs contact with the gang and becomes determined to keep Danny from going down the same violent path as he did.","poster_path":"/euypWkaYFOLW3e5rLIcTAjWnhhT.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":56.323,"release_date":"1998-07-01","video":false,"vote_average":8.347,"vote_count":11323},{"backdrop_path":"/oirihXGa5nm08QssHHH4qi59Dm6.jpg","id":310569,"title":"The Second Mother","original_title":"Que Horas Ela Volta?","overview":"After leaving her daughter Jessica in a small town in Pernambuco to be raised by relatives, Val spends the next 13 years working as a nanny to Fabinho in São Paulo. She has financial stability but has to live with the guilt of having not raised Jessica herself. As Fabinho’s university entrance exams approach, Jessica reappears in her life and seems to want to give her mother a second chance. However, Jessica has not been raised to be a servant and her very existence will turn Val’s routine on its head.
